attributes.name: isGrounded
attributes.doc: true when the actor is standing on ground

attributes.name: isMovingX
attributes.doc: true when the actor is moving in x direction

attributes.name: isMovingY
attributes.doc: true when the actor is moving in y direction

attributes.name: numContacts
attributes.doc: the amount of contacts which are currently pending

attributes.name: maxVelocityX
attributes.doc: the maximum velocity in x direction

attributes.name: maxVelocityY
attributes.doc: the maximum velocity in y direction

attributes.name: justLanded
attributes.doc: if true the actors just landed on solid ground
